rukus.text: kitabun unzila ilayka fala yakun fi sadrika harajun min'hu litundhira bihi wadhik'ra lil'mu'minina
ittabiʿu ma unzila ilaykum min rabbikum wala tattabiʿu min dunihi awliyaa qalilan ma tadhakkaruna
wakam min qaryatin ahlaknaha fajaaha basuna bayatan aw hum qailuna
fama kana daʿwahum idh jaahum basuna illa an qalu inna kunna zalimina
falanasalanna alladhina ur'sila ilayhim walanasalanna l-mur'salina
falanaqussanna ʿalayhim biʿil'min wama kunna ghaibina
wal-waznu yawma-idhin l-haqu faman thaqulat mawazinuhu fa-ulaika humu l-muf'lihuna
waman khaffat mawazinuhu fa-ulaika alladhina khasiru anfusahum bima kanu biayatina yazlimuna
walaqad makkannakum fi l-ardi wajaʿalna lakum fiha maʿayisha qalilan ma tashkuruna
